titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Irving Weinstein Papers TAM.292
titlestmt.author: Maggie Schreiner

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-11-30 14:23:56 -0500.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Irving Weinstein in 2002. The accession number related with this gift is 2002.033.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. Materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Irving Weinstein Papers; TAM 292; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection includes correspondence, unpublished writings and ephemera.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Irving Weinstein were transferred to New York University in 2002 by Irving Weinstein. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu.
